title: 'Moments of the Unknown': Justin Aversano Shares Globetrotting Love Letter to Humanity
contentSnippet: From New York to Antarctica, Justin Aversano's latest work is a journey across continents, cultures, and the human heartbeat.

title: US Treasury chief Bessent says 'substantial' trade framework with China reached
contentSnippet: Secretary Scott Bessent said the negotiations alleviate the need for the 100% additional tariffs announced by US president Trump in October.

title: Alibaba’s Qwen Deep Research Creates Live Webpages, Podcasts in Seconds
contentSnippet: Alibaba's Qwen Deep Research now converts reports into live webpages and podcasts with one click. Here's how the free service compares to Gemini, ChatGPT, and Grok.

title: XRP Ledger Validator Sees NFT-to-NFT Trading Potential in Proposed 'Batch' Amendment
contentSnippet: The proposed Batch amendment for the XRP Ledger introduces atomic transaction capabilities.

title: Bitcoin Bid, XRP Retakes 200-Day Average as Fed Rate Cut Looms; 'Mag 7' Earnings, Trump-Xi Summit Eyed
contentSnippet: Major cryptocurrencies are trading higher ahead of a busy week featuring key Federal Reserve and Bank of Japan rate decisions alongside earnings reports from influential Mag 7 stocks.

title: The next era of crypto belongs to decentralized markets
contentSnippet: DeFi trading volumes hit record ratios against CEXs as matured infrastructure and regulatory clarity shift power to transparent, code-driven platforms.

title: Betting Scandals Are Rocking Sports. Will Prediction Markets Help or Hurt?
contentSnippet: Government regulators and legal experts warn that insider trading could proliferate in professional sports as wagers migrate to prediction markets.

title: Gold’s Pause is Bitcoin’s Pulse as Risk Appetite Returns Ahead of the Fed Week
contentSnippet: The move comes as the BTC/gold ratio — a measure of Bitcoin’s relative value against the yellow metal — flashed its most oversold reading in nearly three years last week.

title: Solana's Marinade Labs CEO Eyes Lower Barrier to Entry for Validators After 'Alpenglow' Upgrade
contentSnippet: In a conversation with CoinDesk, Marinade Labs' Michael Repetny gives an overview of the Solana staking ecosystem and the upcoming Alpenglow upgrade.

title: Teucrium CEO: 'Enormous Interest' in XRP, 'Extraordinary’ Success for Firm's XRP ETF
contentSnippet: Sal Gilbertie says hundreds of millions of dollars arrived in about 16 weeks, credits the XRP Army for fast traction and forecasts a broad crypto ETF wave.

title: Bitcoin Tops $113K, SOL, ADA, ETH Jump as US–China Trade Progress Lifts Risk Appetite
contentSnippet: That risk sentiment across global markets. US and Asian equity futures advanced, and gold pulled back slightly from recent highs as traders rotated back into risk assets.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Bitcoin Shines as a 'Liquidity Barometer,' Not an Inflation Hedge, NYDIG Says
contentSnippet: Gold, traditionally seen as an inflation hedge, also shows inconsistent and often negative correlations with inflation, the data shows.

title: ‘House is fine, but door is jammed’: AWS outage shows crypto’s weak spot
contentSnippet: The 15-hour Amazon Web Services outage that halted Coinbase, Robinhood and MetaMask revealed how much of Web3 still relies on centralized servers.

title: Bitcoin price starts $112K breakout as Fed rate-cut odds pass 98%
contentSnippet: Bitcoin price action favored bulls as the weekly close neared, with BTC nearing $113,000 ahead of a key week for the Federal Reserve.

title: CZ’s pardon came after costly Binance lobbying push in Washington: Politico
contentSnippet: CZ’s pardon by Trump followed a lobbying push that included $450,000 to Trump-linked lobbyists and $290,000 to former SEC chair contender Teresa Goody Guillén.

title: Coinbase wants to bring the entire startup lifecycle onchain, CEO Armstrong says
contentSnippet: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong said onchain fundraising could make capital formation “more efficient, fair, and transparent.”

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、ビットマインの大規模なETH押し目買いやSOL現物ETFが香港初承認など
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、XRP、BNB、ソラナといった主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: Coinbase’s x402 transactions explode over 10,000% in a month
contentSnippet: Coinbase’s x402 protocol, which enables AI agents to transact autonomously over the internet, has seen a 10,000% rise in transaction activity over a month.

title: 米中首脳会談が焦点、関係改善なら相場に追い風も｜bitbankアナリスト寄稿
contentSnippet: 今週のビットコイン対円相場は1700万円周辺で方向感に欠ける展開。30日の米中首脳会談や来週のFOMCでの利下げ・QT停止観測が注目される中、24日のCPIや25日の通商協議を控え、相場に方向感が出る可能性を指摘。半減期サイクルの節目を過ぎたものの、金融緩和環境は2021年と大きく異なる状況。

title: 週刊ニュース｜金価格の2020年以来の下落幅や金融庁による銀行の仮想通貨投資解禁の正式検討に高い関心
contentSnippet: 今週は、金価格下落からのビットコインへの資金移動の可能性、金融庁による銀行の仮想通貨投資解禁の正式検討、量子コンピュータのリスクに関する記事が最も関心を集めた。

title: Kyrgyzstan launches stablecoin on BNB Chain, confirms future CBDC rollout
contentSnippet: A stablecoin is now live in Kyrgyzstan, which confirmed plans to launch a CBDC and explore a national crypto reserve after meeting with strategic adviser Changpeng Zhao.

title: Trump Names SEC Crypto Task Force Head Selig as Next Nominee to Run U.S. CFTC
contentSnippet: If confirmed, current SEC official Mike Selig would take over the U.S. commodities watchdog as it's poised to be given wide authority over crypto.

title: 仮想通貨取引所ランキング｜実績・ユーザー評判・プロ分析で徹底比較
contentSnippet: 投資のプロが選ぶ仮想通貨取引所おすすめランキング最新版。IEO投資、ビットコイン（BTC）、イーサリアム（ETH）、XRP（リップル）、ソラナ（SOL）など人気銘柄の取扱いやユーザー評判を初心者目線で徹底比較。

title: REX-Osprey XRP ETF (XRPR) Surpasses $100M in Assets Under Management
contentSnippet: The ETF has managed this milestone in just over five weeks.

title: ISM Manufacturing PMI suggests Bitcoin cycle may extend beyond historical norm
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s market cycles may stretch longer as ISM manufacturing data remains weak, hinting at extended macro headwinds and slower business recovery.

title: AI Biodefense Startup Valthos Launches With $30 Million, OpenAI Backing
contentSnippet: New York-based startup Valthos is developing AI systems to identify and counter biological threats before they spread.

title: SOL Now on Fidelity’s Retail Platform as Price Tests $195 While $188 Support Draws Focus
contentSnippet: SOL lands on Fidelity's retail trading platform, Gemini launches the Solana edition of its credit card, and $188 emerges as the key support level to watch.

title: Meet the Roaring Kitty of Beyond Meat: 'I Would Feel Guilty Selling'
contentSnippet: Beyond Meat bull Dimitri "Capybara Stocks" Semenikhin helped pump the latest meme stock, but said he'll feel relieved once the chaos cools.

title: テザー社、AI事業に本腰　大規模公開データセットとAIアプリをリリース
contentSnippet: テザー社がSTEM分野特化の大規模AIデータセット「QVACジェネシスI」とプライバシー重視アプリ「QVACワークベンチ」をリリースした。AI事業を本格始動させている。

title: テザー　今年2.3兆円の利益見込む、米国向け「USAT」は1億米国ユーザーへのリーチ目指す
contentSnippet: テザーは今年の利益が2.3兆円に達する見込みだ。米国向けのステーブルコインはUSATは12月にローンチ予定。

title: 大口投資家、4日間で74億円相当のソラナを購入　ビットコインの大口購入も
contentSnippet: オンチェーンアナリストの報告によると、大口投資家が直近4日間で約25万ソラナ（SOL）を購入したことが明らかになった。

title: 中規模保有者（ドルフィン）の需要がビットコイン市場を牽引＝CryptoQuantレポート
contentSnippet: CryptoQuantが仮想通貨市場の最新レポートで、中規模保有者「ドルフィン」がビットコインの蓄積を続けていると指摘した。重要な価格水準や動向を解説している。

title: 米民主党議員、トランプ大統領によるCZ氏恩赦を批判
contentSnippet: 米下院金融サービス委員会のランキングメンバーである民主党議員は公式声明で、トランプ米大統領が仮想通貨取引所バイナンスの共同創設者CZ氏に恩赦を与えたことを批判。恩赦の背景などを説明している。

title: 日本で買える仮想通貨｜銘柄一覧・用途別分類
contentSnippet: 暗号資産（仮想通貨）ビットコインやイーサリアムなど国内取引所で購入可能な主要26銘柄を送金・決済、スマートコントラクト、サービス利用の3つに整理して紹介。取引所別の対応状況一覧も掲載。

title: Elon Musk's SpaceX Moves $133 Million Worth of Bitcoin
contentSnippet: Elon Musk's space exploration firm, SpaceX, moved $133 million worth of Bitcoin on Friday after transferring funds earlier this week.

title: Trump Picks SEC Crypto Task Force’s Mike Selig to Run CFTC: Report
contentSnippet: Selig, chief counsel for the SEC’s pro-crypto task force, is the president’s latest choice to run the CFTC, according to a Bloomberg report.

title: Public Keys: DraftKings Gets Predictable, Canaan Turns Around and Zelle Likes Stables
contentSnippet: DraftKings buys Railbird, Canaan rebounds from near-delisting, and Zelle embraces stablecoins in this week's Public Keys.

title: Custodia, Vantage Expand Pilot Into Live Tokenized Deposit Network for US Banks
contentSnippet: The two banks have moved from pilot to production with a platform that lets U.S. lenders issue interoperable tokenized deposits compliant with the GENIUS Act.

title: YouTube Rival Rumble Teams With Tether to Add Bitcoin Tipping for Creators
contentSnippet: Publicly traded video sharing and livestream platform Rumble is adding Bitcoin tipping for its creator base.
